title: Podman and Libkrun
author: Brent Baude
description: Podman machine’s primary virtualization driver is referred to as a “provider”. In April 2024, I added support for the krun as a provider for MacOS. We made little mention of the additio…
cndescription: Podman machine 的主要虚拟化驱动程序被称为“提供程序”。2024 年 4 月，我为 MacOS 添加了对 krun 作为提供程序的支持。我们对添加…
